name: HelloRhymesforgreatlearning
0:
”Alexa, open hello Rhymes”
”Alexa, open hello Rhymes and start playing”
”Alexa, launch hello Rhymes and start”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hello rhymes
des:
A Rhyme skill that plays popular nursery rhymes.
Let your kids learn popular English rhymes 
faster by listening the rhymes again and again.
Let your kids fall in love with our Alexa rhymes skill.

It is very easy to play a rhyme.Just enable the skill and say :
"Alexa open hello rhymes and start playing"
"next"
"play, Johny Johny"
"play, twinkle twinkle"
"pause"
"resume"
"next"
"play rhyme, Humpty Dumpty"

Some of the popular rhymes are listed below.

English Rhymes
Twinkle Twinkle little stars.
Johny Johny yes papa.
Jack and Jill went up the hill.
Humpty Dumpty Sat on a wall.
Ba Ba Black Ship.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
